EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Seasoned
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Universal Spellpower per AP spent in this tree. You are attuned to the cycles of the world around you. You gain the ability to embody Summer or Winter. While summer is active, you have +5 Spellpower when casting fire, light, sonic and positive spells. While winter is active, you have +5 Spellpower when casting water, acid, earth and electric spells. This seasonal Spellpower is multiplied by one for every Core enhancement possessed in Season's Herald (starting with this one), up to +30 when you have all six Enhancements. Each season lasts for 5 minutes and when it ends, the next season begins.

Stance.Name: Summer
Stance.Description: While summer is active, you have +5 Spellpower when casting fire, light, sonic and positive spells.

Stance.Name: Winter
Stance.Description: While winter is active, you have +5 Spellpower when casting water, acid, earth and electric spells.

Effect.DisplayName: Seasons Herald: Spell power per action point
Seasons Herald: Fire spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Time
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 caster level for spells appropriate to your season.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 max caster level for spells appropriate to your season

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Sunburst
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Sunburst (Cost: 4 SP. Cooldown: 26 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Storm of Vengeance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Storm of Vengeance (Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 2 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Hierophant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are wise and skilled in the art of wielding divine magic to summon aid and change the world around you. +2 Wisdom Your Conjuration and Transmutation spells gain +2 DC, +2 caster level and +2 max caster level. Each time the seasons change, you gain +100% chance to critical with your next spell, and its spell points cost is one tenth its normal cost.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25%/+50%/+75% to the effectiveness of your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells. Adds +1/+2/+3 to the save DC's of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Season's Greetings
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Moves the season to either Summer or Winter.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Season's Greetings: Summer
EnhancementSelection.Description: You speed the season along to summer. (Cooldown: [22.5/15/7.5] minutes)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Season's Greetings: Winter
EnhancementSelection.Description: You speed the season along to winter. (Cooldown: [22.5/15/7.5] minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Beguile
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you attack or cast a spell on an enemy, there is a 50% chance to Beguile an affected enemy [1/0-2/0-3] times for [3/0-6/0-9] seconds. Beguile: -2% attack speed, -2 Spellpower. Beguile stacks up to 25 times, and one stack fades every few seconds. Up to one enemy affected each second (by up to [1/2/3] stacks).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Wax and Wane I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% critical chance with spells associated with your current season. Winter: Acid, Cold, Electric, Earth, and Water Summer: Fire, Light, Positive, and Sonic

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Negotiator
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Bluff, Diplomacy, Perform, and Haggle. Rank 3: +5 Universal Spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Spell Penetration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You add +1/+2/+3 to your Caster Level check to overcome enemy Spell Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Efficient Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of the following Metamagic feats. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Produce Flame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Produce Flame (Cost: [6/5/3] SP. Cooldown: [12/10/8] seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Wax and Wane II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% critical chance with spells associated with your current season. Winter: Acid, Cold, Electric, Earth, and Water Summer: Fire, Light, Positive, and Sonic

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Action Boost: Spellpower
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a [10/20/30] action boost bonus to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Natures Warden
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are a protector of the natural order. Aberrations and Undead take an extra [1/2/4]d6 bane damage when affected by your offensive spells. This extra damage applies to up to one enemy per seconds. This only functions with spells that are purely offensive. Spells such as Cure Light Wounds that are castable on either friends or enemies are unaffected.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Efficient Metamagic: Heighten
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Using the Heighten Spell feat costs you [1/2] less spell points per level of heightening.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Creeping Cold
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Creeping Cold (Cost: [6/5/3] SP. Cooldown: [12/10/8] seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Wax and Wane III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% critical chance with spells associated with your current season. Winter: Acid, Cold, Electric, Earth, and Water Summer: Fire, Light, Positive, and Sonic

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Wisdom I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Spring Resurgence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Fill an ally with the vitality of spring. When that ally falls below 50% hit points, that ally and any other allies near him are healed by 20d6 positive energy, and receive a +2 primal bonus to attack rolls. (Lasts 5 minutes or until triggered.) (Activation Cost: [8/6/4] Spell Points. Cooldown: [8/6/4] seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Autumnal Susurrus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your word whispers in their targets mind, filling their hearts with words of dissolution. Your acid, negative and electricity spells have [10/20/40]% chance of applying the shaken condition to their target.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Call Lightning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Call Lightning (Cost: [10/8/6] SP. Cooldown: [12/10/8] seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Wax and Wane IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% critical chance with spells associated with your current season. Winter: Acid, Cold, Electric, Earth, and Water Summer: Fire, Light, Positive, and Sonic

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Wisdom II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Crown of Summer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: A target of your choice is filled with the light and vitality of summer. That target gains a 30% enhancement bonus to Healing Amplification, and his or her weapons are enchanted so that they deal 2d6 extra light damage. Only one character can have the Crown of Summer buff at a time, and weapons can only have one item enchantment at a time. (Activation Cost: 1 Spell Point. Cooldown: 6 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Winter's Heart
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You represent the chill invitability of winter and life's end. Your cold spells have a 5% chance to trigger a sudden blast of cold and snow, centered on you. Enemies struck by this attack take 1d10+30 cold damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Word of Balance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Word of Balance (Cost: [12/9/6] SP. Cooldown: [25/20/15] seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Time and Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 caster level and +1 max caster level for spells appropriate to your season.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Strength of the Solstice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to the save DC's of your Evocation and Transmutation spells.
